== Kuthannur-I (627694) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Kuthannur-I is a village in the [[Alathur]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 2451 hectares and harbouring 4057 households with total population of 17471 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Palakkad]] is at a distance of 20 km. Male population is 8450 and female population is 9021. Scheduled Caste Population is 3670 and Scheduled Tribes population is 28. Census Location Code of the village is 627694<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 13366 (76.5%)
* Literate male population: 6908 (81.75%)
* Literate female population: 6458 (71.59%)
